item.title: How It Works
item.description: In a nutshell s3mon will list and search for files starting with prefix on a list of defined buckets that are not older than a specified age. These options are defined in a config.yml file, (YAML formated) The config file Example of a configuration file: --- s3mon: endpoint: s3.provider region: <aws-region> access_key: ACCESS_KEY_ID secret_key: SECRET_ACCESS_KEY buckets: bucket_A: - prefix: starts_with_foo age: 86400 size: 30720 bucket_B: - prefix: file age: 43200 size: 1024 - prefix: exact_file_name age: 43200 If your S3 provider is AWS you can omit the endpoint and only specify a region, for example:
